title: TGRoss
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Should You Target These Sectors?
items.description: Hey, Ross Givens here! Analysts are showing their cards for Q2, and Energy is getting the most love, while Consumer Staples lags behind. I don’t blind...
